PROFILE

I'm a web development consultant working for clients from all over the world.

A skilled software engineer with expertise in managing teams and projects to deliver software. Javascript (AngularJS) and Ruby (Rails) expert with 8 years of experience developing web apps.

Back in high school, worked as a front end developer and ran a web hosting business. Graduated with a Master in Software Engineering. Interned in Jolicloud, one of the most successful startups in Paris. Worked in both big and small companies, and besides winning awards for his apps, participating at hackathons, and organising events and meetups, founded and ran his own startup. Founder of web services like HostingCamel.com, Startupality.com and NomadsMap.com.

Currently works as a web development consultant, helping companies from all over the world, mainly funded US startups. Specialised in rapidly making and marketing web applications.

  • Javascript & Angular.js
  • Ruby & Ruby on Rails
  • Node.js
  • Marketing
  • Product Management
  • User Experience

FEATURED PROJECT
Full stack web development
Hockeysticks

Worked remotely as a part of the founding team, responsible for Hockeysticks project. Developed Hockeysticks, an internal app used by the management of a San Francisco web publishing company. Implemented importing and management of the revenues made from various video ad networks and expenses spent on ads along with system which takes into account data about visitors to the site received from sites like Google Analytics. Combining this big amount of data gathered through machine learning it makes conclusions about how to optimize on which ads to spend the money to get more impressions and improve the profit from ads on the blog sites in it's network.

 Client:
Action Factory
 Location:
San Francisco, USA
 Year:
2013
OTHER FEATURED PROJECTS
MOVIE TWEET

As a team leader managed a team of 5 developers. After producing design and test plans contributed to development of an app aiming to help its users with deciding which movies to watch and recommending them movies based on popularity and mentions on twitter.

DEVEX UI TOOLBOX
Devex

As a part of a large globally dispersed team worked in an agile manner, developed the abstract component-based UI toolbox based on Twitter Bootstrap and added several new components to the toolbox. Interacted daily with team spread across three continents. Integrated UI components to Ruby on Rails app, consulted the company and developed the best practices regarding UI components.


Andrej is someone who has a natural curiosity and deep eagerness to learn new things. He integrated easily into our team and was a perfect fit for our company!

- Romain Huet, Jolicloud & Twitter
